law.history: Repealed 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 26. -- Amended 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. II, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4384-7, 4434-31.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Superintendent to control and appoint division heads and employes.
